channel.title: Help with a ::report command

item.title: Help with a ::report command
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

I want a command that is setup like this:

 ::report [player]-[offense]

and it sends this message to all mods/admins on the server.

Example:

Player1 sees an offense, and types:

[u]player1:[/u] ::report player332-offensive language

This message is sent to everyone with playerRights of 1 or higher on the server:

Player1: player332-offensive language
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 01:32:09 PM[/size][hr]Ive come up with this so far, but i know it wont work:

else if (command.startsWith(“report”) && command.length() > 7)
{

command.substring(5).replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.substring(5).trim();

	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "<Report>  " +command.substring(7); //Not to all, but to playerRights >= 1
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2008, 02:09:33 pm[/size][hr]Any help?

Read full topic
